prog: (PARI) LIM = prime(80)^2; v = vector(400); count = 0; forprime (p = 2, prime(80), x = 2; while (p^x <= LIM, count++; v[count] = p^x; x = nextprime(x + 1))); v = vecsort(vector(count, i, v[i])); vector(count, i, bigomega(v[i])) - _David Wasserman_, Feb 17 2006
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 28 2000
